attributes.action: Parliament debate whether Israel has 'improper influence' over British Politics
attributes.additional_details:
An investigation revealed plots by the Israeli diplomat and a British civil servant to destroy the careers of numerous senior politicians.
It is only on the basis of an investigation that Parliament and the British Public will be reassured that such activities will not be tolerated by ANY British government.

Therefore, and due to the Mrs May's outright rejection of a Public Inquiry into the matter, it is deemed necessary to debate whether this decision is right.

Please sign and share ..
attributes.background: Theresa May has arrogantly 'rejected' calls, from the leader of the opposition party, for a Public Inquiry, into alleged 'improper influences' by Israel in British politics, after the activities of an Israeli embassy officer were caught on tape discussing a plot to "take down" British politicians.
